subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[莅]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified form}} of ''<big>蒞</big>'' and {{l|mul|涖}} in mainland China, also a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} of ''<big>蒞</big>'' in modern Taiwan)''
* {{l|mul|[[涖]]}} ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant}} {{w|Traditional Chinese characters|traditional form}} of ''<big>蒞</big>)
